label: attr-fourth-moment-baoab
name: Fourth-Moment Uniform Bounds for BAOAB
proof_strategy: Lyapunov on E^2(Z) = (1/2|v|^2 + U(x))^2 + rigorous variance bound + Young's inequality
lyapunov_inequality: E[E^2(Z_{k+1}) | Z_k] <= (1 - kappa_E * dt) E^2(Z_k) + C_4 * dt
notes: Prerequisite for BAOAB weak convergence analysis
Uses Lyapunov on energy squared (not just energy)
Rigorous variance calculation for energy change
Constants independent of dt for dt < dt_0
Key: Fourth moment needed for higher-order generator expansions
external_references: Mattingly et al (2002) - Ergodicity for SDEs
